title: FYP #31 Holding On to Your People
description:
This is one of the most important chapters from Find Your People. Now that you’ve found them, how do you hang on to them? Here are seven traps to avoid that can derail your friendships.

Download the book club guide PDF here: jennieallen.com

Get your copy of Find Your People: findyourpeoplebook.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267

Learn more about the 7 week Find Your People video Bible study at jennieallen.com/bible-studies
